content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt. He is from Germany.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What was the final agreed rental price?
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What was the final agreed rental price?
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: The final agreed rental price was €850 per month, including all utilities.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] What was the initial price proposed by Peter Schmidt?
[Question] How many times did you need to negotiate the price before reaching an agreement?
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: The initial price proposed by Peter Schmidt was €900 per month, including all utilities. We negotiated the price twice before reaching an agreement.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What was the highest price you proposed before reaching an agreement?
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: The highest price I proposed before reaching an agreement was €875 per month, including all utilities.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] How did you feel about the negotiation process?
name: Maryam Abbasi
